nodes.text: This Twi'lek child and his mother were captured as hostages at a Coruscant train station by Cassie Cryar, a thief of the Coruscant underworld, while she was being chased by the Jedi Padawan Ahsoka Tano. The Twi'lek child was freed when Jedi Master Tera Sinube disarmed Cryar and knocked her unconscious.
